name: places/ChIJ53Dh__9ZwokR7jMWeIT-jG4
formattedAddress: 1500 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1500 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10029, USA

editorialSummary.text: Drugstore chain selling a variety of beauty & health products, plus some grocery & household items.

originalText.text: Worst service ever. Came here three times to pick up a Rx in one day. Everytime different excuse and asked me to come back later. In the end, they told me no one could mix my Rx and rushed to close the pharmacy. Please save you trip.and go to another place if you are suffering from your condition already. Don't come here for more suffering. Bad staff, the worst service.

text.text: Worst service ever. Came here three times to pick up a Rx in one day. Everytime different excuse and asked me to come back later. In the end, they told me no one could mix my Rx and rushed to close the pharmacy. Please save you trip.and go to another place if you are suffering from your condition already. Don't come here for more suffering. Bad staff, the worst service.

originalText.text: Because I am disabled, my prescriptions are supposed to be automatically delivered. About a week ago I was informed that my 6 prescriptions were ready for pickup. All week I have been trying to phone them to remind them about delivery. My hold times have varied between 15 minutes and an hour. No one ever picks up the phone! This is a very unprofessional way of doing business.

text.text: Because I am disabled, my prescriptions are supposed to be automatically delivered. About a week ago I was informed that my 6 prescriptions were ready for pickup. All week I have been trying to phone them to remind them about delivery. My hold times have varied between 15 minutes and an hour. No one ever picks up the phone! This is a very unprofessional way of doing business.

originalText.text: No one ever picks up the phone at the pharmacy. This is the third day in a row that I’m calling and waiting on hold up to an hour with no one picking up. Every month there is a problem with filling my script and every time I need to physically go in multiple times to get it sorted out since no one answers the phone *ever*. The lines at the pharmacy are wild too. 20-30 minutes at busy times and the pick up line can’t help with unexpected issues. They can’t see the issue, just that they can’t help you and you can’t get your meds. They point you to the line to speak with the pharmacist, which can be another 20+ minute wait. This is a ridiculous store policy for the staff to have to follow, and highly aggravating for customers who don’t have a half day to wait around. I’d like to be done with them, but I can’t even get them to pick up the phone to cancel my active script so I can get it filled somewhere else and don’t have a half day to physically go over there. These are essential medications and I feel like they’re being held hostage. I have written complaints to corporate, to no avail. Apparently they are understaffed and took on a nearby, recently closed location’s clients. The stress of dealing with them every month is just too much! I will say the stuff is always very kind and professional for the disaster of a situation they’re being left to deal with.

originalText.text: No matter what time of the day I call, I am unable to get through to anyone at the pharmacy. Today I waited on hold for over 2.5 hours and still no one picked up. This is unfortunately typical for them. To go in person is always at least a 30 minute wait as well, often more than an hour, and they are rarely able to solve any problems right away, which requires more waiting. This pharmacy needs extended hours and more staff urgently. I will be switching to a different pharmacy.

originalText.text: I feel like there has to be something illegally negligent going on here. I have been unable to get several very important medications in a timely manner. They literally NEVER answer the phone, so I have to go in person and the lines are always at least 20 mins, I actually bring a book to read every time I come now because it very often can take up to an hour to get things sorted out. I was fed up with never getting my medications without an issue about 90% of the times I've gone so I tried to transfer to another pharmacy but they never answered the phone of the other pharmacy to complete the transfer so my medications are pretty much being held hostage here. I'm at a loss but I need to get all of my medications out of here asap.
